timeline.message:

timeline.author: Vojtech-Sassmann
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -7815,16 +7825,30 @@ paths:
         - MembersManager
       operationId: createSpecificMember
       summary: Creates a new member from candidate which is prepared for creating specificUser.
-      parameters:
-        - { name: candidate, in: query, required: true, schema: { $ref: '#/components/schemas/Candidate'}, description: 'candidate'}
-        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/voId'
-        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/specificUserType'
-        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/specificUserOwners'
       responses:
         '200':
           $ref: '#/components/responses/MemberResponse'
         default:
           $ref: '#/components/responses/ExceptionResponse'
+      requestBody:
+        required: true
+        content:
+          application/json:
+            schema:
+              title: InputSpecificMember
+              description: "input to createSpecificMember"
+              type: object
+              required:
+                - candidate
+                - voId
+                - specificUserType
+                - specificUserOwners
+              properties:
+                candidate: { $ref: '#/components/schemas/Candidate' }
+                voId: { type: integer }
